content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
No new structures have been successfully established. Repeated attempts were made to craft and place a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5) for supplying Automation Science Packs, but the Lab remains unavailable due to ongoing resource and placement issues. Although the agent accessed existing furnace entities—one at Position(5.0, 5.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron plates and another at Position(–27.0, –60.0) used for copper plate production—these were not built as new structures.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Invocation Errors:
  – For get_entities, use the correct signature as specified by the API. Avoid using unsupported keyword arguments (e.g. “radius”) or supplying an incorrect number of positional arguments.
  
• Lab Crafting and Placement Failures:
  – Ensure that all required sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are available and that prerequisite processing (e.g., sufficient smelting outputs) has been completed before attempting to craft a Lab.
  – Verify that the Lab exists in inventory prior to attempting placement to prevent placement errors.
  
• Iteration over Non‐Iterable Results:
  – When filtering retrieved entities (for example, when extracting labs), safeguard against None values by defaulting to an empty list before iteration.
